trans-unit.source: Instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to disable the mandatory processing of headers not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*> collection that must be understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.

By default the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client or service runtime throws an exception when it encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
To prevent this behavior, use the MustUnderstandBehavior and set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property to `false`.
Typically, this is used in scenarios where the message content is meant to be relayed somewhere else and not processed, such as a router service.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior"></xref> class using the specified value.

Pass `false` as the `validate` parameter to this constructor to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
A value that specifies whether to enforce validation of <xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""></xref> headers.
Supports behavior functionality.
Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A> to support behavior functionality.
The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
The binding parameters for the behavior.
Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
The client runtime to set.

Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A> to support behavior functionality.
The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
The dispatcher to set.
Supports behavior functionality.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
The endpoint to validate.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to ensure that a header is understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.

Set the ValidateMustUnderstand property to `false` to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header must be correctly processed or a fault is thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
